name: Kostis Stanis
story: Angelos was born and raised in a small village in Greece. He always had a passion for guns and the military. After completing his compulsory service, he decided to pursue a career in the army. He joined the BLUFOR faction and quickly rose to the rank of Private. His skills as an Autorifleman are unparalleled, and he is always ready to take on any mission that comes his way.
